channel.title: CVE Feed for Forma -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Forma -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-41679|2024-08-03T12:49:43.458Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: Forma LMS version 3.1.0 and earlier are affected by an Cross-Site scripting vulnerability, that could allow a remote attacker to inject javascript code on the “back_url” parameter in appLms/index.php?modname=faq&op=play function. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to steal the user´s cookies in order to log in to the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-41681|2024-08-03T12:49:43.910Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: There is a vulnerability on Forma LMS version 3.1.0 and earlier that could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to privilege escalate in order to upload a Zip file through the SCORM importer feature. The exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to a remote code injection.

item.title: CVE-2022-42924|2024-08-03T13:19:05.480Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: Forma LMS on its 3.1.0 version and earlier is vulnerable to a SQL injection vulnerability. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to perform a SQL injection on the 'dyn_filter' parameter in the 'appLms/ajax.adm_server.php?r=widget/userselector/getusertabledata' function in order to dump the entire database.

item.title: CVE-2022-42923|2024-08-03T13:19:05.495Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: Forma LMS on its 3.1.0 version and earlier is vulnerable to a SQL injection vulnerability. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to perform a SQL injection on the 'id' parameter in the 'appCore/index.php?r=adm/mediagallery/delete' function in order to dump the entire database or delete all contents from the 'core_user_file' table.

item.title: CVE-2022-42925|2024-08-03T13:19:05.524Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: There is a vulnerability on Forma LMS version 3.1.0 and earlier that could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to privilege escalate in order to upload a Zip file through the plugin upload component. The exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to a remote code injection.

item.title: CVE-2022-41680|2024-08-03T12:49:43.587Z -- forma -- forma%20lms
item.description: Forma LMS on its 3.1.0 version and earlier is vulnerable to a SQL injection vulnerability. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker (with the role of student) to perform a SQL injection on the 'search[value] parameter in the appLms/ajax.server.php?r=mycertificate/getMyCertificates' function in order to dump the entire database.
